titles.title: Reward and Encourage New Business Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for business start-up expenditures from $5,000 to $10,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/13/2014--Introduced. Reward and Encourage New Business Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $5,000 to $10,000 the maximum amount of the tax deduction for business start-up expenditures.
